words.def: a visible suspension in the air of particles of some substance
A sailing vessel found in the waters of Micronesia and Indonesia; it has a single, large outrigger and a triangular sail.
A unit of electrical power, in an AC circuit, equal to the power dissipated when 1 volt produces a current of 1 ampere.
a reproach for some lapse or misdeed
(golf) the standard number of strokes set for each hole on a golf course, or for the entire course
an athlete who plays for pay
an implement used to propel or steer a boat
op Op art ; a style of abstract art.
an informal term for a father
a state in northwestern United States on the Pacific
a colorless and odorless inert gas
